name: PACMAN 3D (GAME X STUDIO)
description:
PACMAN 3Dis a maze chase video game. The player controls the eponymous character through an enclosed maze; the objective of the game is to eat all of the dots placed in the maze while avoiding four colored ghosts — Blinky (red), Pinky (pink), Inky (cyan), and Clyde (orange) — that pursue him.

If you will like it so please follow  me hare .......
